content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad we are discussing the rental price now. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 400 Euro per month is a reasonable price for such apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 400 Euro per month is far below my expectations. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 500 Euro per month is still below my expectations. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, let's split the difference. How about 450 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 450 Euro per month is still below my expectations. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Fine, let's go up a bit more. How about 480 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 480 Euro per month is still below my expectations. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, let's go up to 495 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
